name: Docker-prestashop-phpmyadmin
body:
### Docker install PrestaShop and PhpMyAdmin :
Installer via Docker, PrestaShop 1.7 avec PhpMyAdmin.

En 4 à 5 lignes de commande on va :
- Installer PrestaShop 1.7
- Installer et le lier à un PhpMyAdmin
- Copier les sources du PrestaShop (themes, modules et/ou override) en local
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
